price: Na wale walio ongoka anawazidishia uongofu na anawapa uchamngu wao.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ
footnotes: Na walio ongoka wakashika njia ya Haki, Mwenyezi Mungu huwazidishia uwongofu, na akawapa kinga chao cha kujikingia na Moto.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
